item.title: Install and configure btsync in Ubuntu 12.04
item.description: This note describes installation of Bittorrent Sync on Ubuntu. Tutorial was tested on Ubuntu 12.04, but it must work for all Debian-based systems. Read full btsync manual for advanced information. ยง Download and install btsync Btsync is provided as single binary file. We will place it into /usr/bin directory. So, download archive with binary file, extract it, remove archive, move binary: wget http://btsync.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/btsync_x64.tar.gz tar xf btsync_x64.tar.gz rm btsync_x64.tar.gz sudo mv btsync /usr/bin/btsync ยง Configure shared folder We will use configuration file instead of web interface.
